name: Marshin
description:
★ Marshin is a cold war era science fiction puzzle platformer featuring an uncanny atmosphere full of distinctive visuals, immersive audio, and mind-bending puzzles. ★


Our story takes place on the fringes of rural Everywhere, USA, during the mid-twentieth century.

You are a young child sleeping in an isolated farmhouse on a particularly dark and stormy night. When something goes *bump* outside your window, will you investigate? Will you rise to the occasion, stepping through the front door and into the darkness?

Inspired by the likes of Welles, Serling, Burton, and Lynch- Marshin offers generous amounts of suspense and horror intertwined with a beautiful yet dark narrative and numerous hauntingly unique puzzles to solve... sure to keep you simultaneously entertained and disturbed for hours on end.


  • Uniquely atmospheric game world chock-full of the dark and surreal.
  • Suspenseful audio/visual experience that will keep you on edge.
  • Mechanical, logic, cryptic, & pattern-based puzzles to solve.
  • Short enough for a casual gamer, long enough for achievement hunters.
  • Delight in a captivating story where you get to decide how it (the world) ends.
